attributes.comment:
I am writing in reference to the proposed increase in fees. I am very much
opposed to this. Because of the length of time for referrals for adoption from
countries such as China, families will be required to resubmitt paperwork. This is
an additional financial burden. I don't think the raising of fees is justified,
considering the electronic age we now live in makes background checks,
fingerprinting etc. that much easier.
Please be considerate of those families required to use this system in their
adoption process and not make the already astronomical fees higher.
A system should be put into place whereby applications that must be refiled in an
18 month period of time pay only 1/2 the original fee.

Carol
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Carol J. Geddis
